description:
This course is designed for the user who wants to create high-quality ebooks, books and reports, quickly and easily.

Everything has been done for you with the use of templates. All you have to do is add your content and you're ready to go.

Here's what you get in this course:

  • A 57 page manual with illustrations showing exactly what to do.
  • 50 ready-to-use photographic templates on the subjects of Cats and Dogs, Fitness, Food, Money and Finance, and Technology.
  • A 6x9 inch book template, ready for use *Set up for integration with the LightningSource on-demand publisher
  • A Kindle template, ready for your content and images.

Testimonial

“Nathan's templates solve a common problem – how to create a professional looking document on a budget, without having to know html or be a graphic designer. Now there's no excuse for anyone to release poor quality eBooks or reports."

Andrew Lock, marketing expert and WebTV presenter HelpMyBusiness

Here's what you will learn:

  • How to add a cover, text boxes and shapes
  • How to add styles (for formatting) to your documents
  • How to change watermarks (the image background)
  • How to add headers and footers
  • How to add bulleted lists to your documents
  • How to resize images to fit your layout
  • How to add a table of contents

Testimonial

"If you create documents in Microsoft Word and seek a professional, polished appearance, not the usual bland Ariel or Times Roman black on a white background, you'll be thrilled by Nathan's Template ebook."

"He not only shows you how to work with - and customize - templates, he also includes dozens of beautiful templates that you can apply to your existing documents in minutes to make them look far, far better."

Dave Taylor, tech expert and founder of AskDaveTaylor
title: How to Create Professional eBooks and Reports with Templates
